testcase.classname: To Add a staff into the system & fee collection
testcase.name: To Add a staff into the system & fee collection
testcase.system-out: Given To Launch the browser and Maximize the window.........................passed When To launch the Url of application.......................................passed And To Login to the application using given credentials.....................passed And Go to ‘Staff Profile Management’ menu and open ‘Staff Add’..............passed And To Enter all mandatory fields in 'Personal Details' section.............passed And To click ‘Save’ button, will add a new staff with the data entered......passed And To Go to ‘Fee Configuration’ menu, you will land on ‘Fee Collection’....passed And To Enter ‘200011312’ into the ‘Global Student Search’ box...............passed And To search...............................................................passed And To Select one pending invoice under ‘Payable’ -> ‘Pending Invoice’ section.passed And To choose the ‘Payment Mode’ under ‘Payments’(bottom left)..............passed And To Click on ‘Pay’ button(bottom right),.................................passed And To Make sure that the payment has been completed successfully...........passed Then To close the chrome browser............................................passed
